name: PonyFacts
0: ”Alexa, ask pony info for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pony info
des: The skill will give you information and interesting facts about ponies. By using this skill you can learn more about ponies, and maybe even some things that you didn't know about them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
